data.title: Christina Pickles Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Christina Pickles on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Christina Pickles including The Wedding Singer, Legends of the Fall, aâ¦
data.text:
The One with All the Thanksgivings

Although the Thanksgiving meal is great, Chandler is still moody over his parent's divorce during the holiday when he was a boy and Ross is depressed about his second divorce. The group reminisces about their worst Thanksgivings in order to cheer them up, and Monica's worst memory is revealed.

The One After Ross Says Rachel

Ross and Emily get married, but Emily cannot forgive him for calling her Rachel during the vows. Rachel ends up going on the trip that Ross and Emily intended to be their honeymoon. After agreeing that they would stop seeing each other upon returning home, Chandler and Monica search for a place to have sex.

The One with Rachel's Book

Joey finds out that Rachel is reading a steamy romance novel. Monica discovers that her parents have spent the money for her wedding on a beach house.

The One with the 'Cuffs

Monica caters a party for her mother, who still doesn't quite know how to talk to her daughter. Chandler's encounter with Rachel's boss leads to an embarrassing situation. And an encyclopedia salesman takes advantage of Joey.
